definition: (informal) a quick private conference, crowd or draw together
details:
noun
- (informal) a quick private conference
= synonyms: powwow
- a disorganized and densely packed crowd
= example: a disorganized and densely packed crowd
verb
- crowd or draw together
= example: crowd or draw together
= synonyms: huddle together
- crouch or curl up
= example: crouch or curl up
= synonyms: cower
